name: tinder_scrape_matches
description: Scrape match list on Tinder. Returns match names and last messages. Requires login.

steps.code: const matches = []; const seen = new Set(); document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="/app/messages/"], [class*="matchList"] a, [class*="messageListItem"] a, [class*="match"] a').forEach((el) => { const href = el.href || ''; if (seen.has(href) || matches.length >= 20) return; seen.add(href); const nameEl = el.querySelector('[class*="name"], span'); const msgEl = el.querySelector('[class*="message"], [class*="preview"], [class*="msg"]'); matches.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', last_message: msgEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: href }); }); return { match_count: matches.length, matches };
steps.name: result
steps.label: Extract matches
